tool.name: tool_7

param.name: STEPS
param.dialogReference:
Number of Steps

Integer

Minimum: 2

Maximum: 365

Default: 14

Number of time steps per year.

param.name: UNITS
param.dialogReference:
Units

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] kWh / m2

[1] kJ / m2

[2] J / cm2

Default: 0

Units for output radiation values.

param.name: HOUR_STEP
param.dialogReference:
Resolution [h]

Floating point

Minimum: 0.000000

Maximum: 24.000000

Default: 0.500000

Time step size for a day's calculation given in hours.

tool.summary: Calculates the annual potential total insolation for given time steps and stores resulting time series in a grid collection.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
